A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Longtime fan\, love all things Star Wars. That said\, this movies story was utter trash. You could have just cut out the second act and made this movie way better. I mean it picks up literally right after TFA and the draw (which is horribly written) states the entire Rebublic has fallen to the First Order! WTF how? I miss the political intrigue of the prequels. 

The visuals of this movie are stunning\, I will give it that. However\, we all know that visuals alone don't make a movie that we return to time and time again. Story is everything. Mark Hammels performance is really one of the redeeming performances of the film. I don't agree with he direction Disney too Luke\, but Mark really should be at least nominated for best supporting actor. Kylo Ren's character was also interesting if a little predictable and cliche. 

I would say save your money and rent it when it comes out.
